message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.IT. 

The paper deals with background subtraction in video, which is a common problem in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses Robust PCA and online subspace tracking, which are techniques commonly used in machine learning and optimization, respectively. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.MM (Mathematical Optimization) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also mentions the use of graphics processing units (GPUs) for real-time performance, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence. Therefore, cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper uses alternating minimization on manifolds, which is a technique commonly used in information theory and signal processing. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) is a less likely but still possible sub-category.
